Source: src/matchActions.js

/**
 * check if an element matches any query strings within the list of actions
 * @param {string | object} element string or object
 * @returns {boolean} element matched a query string
 */

const matchActions = function(element){
    let match = false;
    
    Object.keys(this.actions).forEach((index, i) => {
      
        if (typeof element == 'object') {
          
          if(element.matches(index)) match = true;

        } else if (typeof element == 'string') {
          
          if(element == index) match = true;
        }
        
    })

    return match;

}

module.exports = matchActions;
